column4: Does anyone know why video would be slower on ubuntu than fedora if the ubuntu computer has a faster processor, and more ram
Which one has the better video card, and which one has acceleration supported?
are you SURE it has acceleration supported? The drivers work? Run "glxgears -iacknowledgethatthistoolisnotabenchmark" and tell me the FPS.
Um.. 'kay. I won't be around, but that plus the -iacknowledgethatthistoolisnotabenchmark thingy will give you FPS.
